name: INSendMessageIntentResponseCode
desc: Constants that indicate the response state.

items.name: case ready
items.desc: You are ready to handle the intent.

items.name: case inProgress
items.desc: You are in the process of sending the message but have not yet done so.

items.name: case failure
items.desc: You are unable to send the message.

items.name: case failureRequiringAppLaunch
items.desc: The user must launch your app before they can send the message.

items.name: case failureMessageServiceNotAvailable
items.desc: You were unable to send the message because your message service is currently unavailable.
